name: BatteryBoy (Early Demo)
description:
BatteryBoy is a fun 2D platformer where the goal is to reach the end without dying. However, there is a twist. Everytime you move, you lose power! So plan your movements carefully and get to the end before you don't have any power left!

Current State Of The Game

The game is currently early in development so this is a very early demo to show the potential of the game idea. Any feedback is welcome on this page and it will be incorporated into the final game.

There is only one test level in this demo.

Features
  • Satisifying 2D movement.
  • Power drain on player move.
  • Jump powerups.
  • Hazards such as spikes and acid pools
  • Moving platforms
  • Lasers
  • Timer
  • Level completion
